snippet.title: WRC Generations | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
7 years of hard work, a true passion for motorsport, and absolutely NO CUTS! Kylotonn and Nacon are thrilled to bring you the final instalment in our beloved official WRC Franchise. 

We’ve got all the WRC 2022 calendar action, including the new Rally1 and hybrid cars! Including a return to the world-famous Rally Sweden!

All-new solo and online content, with career options to manage your hybrid-powered cars. A league mode, an improved Team system, and an updated version of our livery editor with sharing!

Prepping the car, running shakedowns and looking at the data… it all shows us that WRC Generations will be available on Oct 13th 2022! Tell your crew chief today! 

-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/Nacon

#WRCGenreations #WRC #SimRacing #Rally
